text: is a male Japanese former international table tennis player. ==Table tennis career== He won a bronze medal in the men's doubles with Keisuke Tsunoda at the 1957 World Table Tennis Championships. He won a gold medal in the team event for Japan. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Japanese male table tennis players Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Toshihiko Miyata
